title: Which of these graphs likely shows an overfitted model?
text: Look for the graph where the line tries to pass through almost every single blue dot, even if it means making sharp, 'wiggly' turns. üêç

title: Which model is likely to perform best on new data?
text: An overfitted model follows the training data very closely but would likely miss new points that fall along the general trend. Which graph looks like that?
